AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Michael Brett Jacquinot: Defendant convicted for possession with intent to distribute marijuana, who entered a conditional plea of guilty and was sentenced to 46 months' imprisonment
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Andrew P. Graham: Border Patrol Agent who stopped the truck based on suspicious behavior and prior experience with smuggling cases
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jay Snodgrass: Border Patrol Agent whose prior observation of the truck was confirmed by Agent Graham
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Andrew P. Graham and Jay Snodgrass: Border Patrol Agents involved in surveillance near the United States/Mexican border, providing reasonable suspicion for a stop based on proximity to the border
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Brignoni-Ponce Jacquinot: driver of the truck, referenced in a legal factor
